data_source: German Federal Office for Information Security (BSI)
notes: 29,500 entities (increased from 4,500 under NIS1). Breakdown: ~3,000 operators of critical facilities (KRITIS) classified as 'particularly important' ~26,500 other essential/important entities
50,000 entities expected to register. Registration platform operational since October 18 2024 at https://platform.acn.gov.it
12,000 entities estimated. Final implementation effective July 1 2025

All NIS2 entities required to register by March 18 2025 via https://atwork.safeonweb.be. Digital sector entities deadline: December 18 2024. Total count not publicly disclosed but registration ongoing

data_source: BSI (Bundesamt für Sicherheit in der Informationstechnik)
notes: Approximately 3000 operators of critical facilities (subset of 29500 total). Subject to enhanced obligations: mandatory attack detection systems evidence of compliance every 3 years critical component tracking

data_source: Law of July 1 2011 on Critical Infrastructure
notes: Operators of critical infrastructure under Belgian law automatically classified as NIS2 essential entities regardless of size
Safeonweb@Work platform: https://atwork.safeonweb.be. Requires Belgian enterprise number (CBE). Legal representatives can register via eID/ItsMe. Delegates use My eGov Role Management

data_source: German Federal Office for Information Security (BSI)
notes: BSI Portal opened January 6 2026. Entities must register within 3 months of law's entry into force (by March 6 2026). Joint platform with Federal Office of Civil Protection (BBK)
ACN digital platform operational since October 18 2024. Self-registration deadline initially February 28 2025 (extended in some cases)
SGS Belgium Amtivo Ireland Bureau Veritas Belgium Lloyd's Register EMEA TÜV Rheinland BSI Group Belgium Vinçotte (Kiwa Belgium). All authorized for ISO 27001:2022 certification in NIS2 context

BSI as central authority for most sectors. Sectoral authorities: BaFin (finance) BNetzA (energy/telecoms) Luftfahrt-Bundesamt (aviation). Operators of critical facilities subject to BSI inspection every 3 years
CCB as central authority. Sectoral inspection services for specific sectors. Essential entities: ex-ante + ex-post supervision. Important entities: ex-post only (reactive)
Report to CERT.be (Belgium's national CSIRT). 24-hour early warning 72-hour incident notification 1-month final report. Portal integrated with Safeonweb@Work
